Morning Quotes.text: Every morning we are born again. What we do today matters most.
Morning Quotes.author: Buddha

Morning Quotes.text: Write it on your heart that every day is the best day in the year.
Morning Quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Morning Quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
Morning Quotes.author: Steve Jobs

Morning Quotes.text: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
Morning Quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

Morning Quotes.text: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
Morning Quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

Morning Quotes.text: I learned very early the difference between knowing the name of something and knowing something.
Morning Quotes.author: Richard Feynman

Morning Quotes.text: Nobody ever figures out what life is all about, and it doesn't matter. Explore the world. Nearly everything is really interesting if you go into it deeply enough.
Morning Quotes.author: Richard Feynman

Morning Quotes.text: Tell me and I forget, teach me and I may remember, involve me and I learn.
Morning Quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

Morning Quotes.text: Energy and persistence conquer all things.
Morning Quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

Morning Quotes.text: Vulnerability is the birthplace of innovation, creativity, and change.
Morning Quotes.author: Brené Brown

Morning Quotes.text: Knowing others is intelligence; knowing yourself is true wisdom. Mastering others is strength; mastering yourself is true power.
Morning Quotes.author: Laotzu

Morning Quotes.text: Strategy without tactics is the slowest route to victory. Tactics without strategy is the noise before defeat.
Morning Quotes.author: Sun Tzu

Morning Quotes.text: The greatest achievers are those who always stay focused on their goals and are consistent in their efforts.
Morning Quotes.author: Adam Grant

Morning Quotes.text: Change is painful, but nothing is as painful as staying stuck somewhere you don't belong.
Morning Quotes.author: Dan Pink

Morning Quotes.text: Leadership is not about being in charge. It's about taking care of those in your charge.
Morning Quotes.author: Simon Sinek

Morning Quotes.text: Owning our story and loving ourselves through that process is the bravest thing we'll ever do.
Morning Quotes.author: Brené Brown

Morning Quotes.text: The most terrifying thing is to accept oneself completely.
Morning Quotes.author: Carl Jung

Morning Quotes.text: Talk to yourself like someone you love.
Morning Quotes.author: Brené Brown

Morning Quotes.text: You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.
Morning Quotes.author: Buddha

Morning Quotes.text: Loving yourself isn't vanity. It is sanity.
Morning Quotes.author: Katrina Mayer

Morning Quotes.text: The relationship with yourself sets the tone for every other relationship you have.
Morning Quotes.author: Jane Travis

Morning Quotes.text: Self-compassion is simply giving the same kindness to ourselves that we would give to others.
Morning Quotes.author: Christopher Germer

Morning Quotes.text: You can't really be present for the people in your life if you can't take care of yourself.
Morning Quotes.author: Kerry Washington

Morning Quotes.text: Gratitude makes sense of our past, brings peace for today, and creates a vision for tomorrow.
Morning Quotes.author: Melody Beattie

Morning Quotes.text: The root of joy is gratefulness.
Morning Quotes.author: David Steindl-Rast

Evening Quotes.text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
Evening Quotes.author: John Lennon

Evening Quotes.text: Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes. Art is knowing which ones to keep.
Evening Quotes.author: Adam Grant

Evening Quotes.text: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
Evening Quotes.author: Dan Pink

Evening Quotes.text: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
Evening Quotes.author: Tim Ferriss

Evening Quotes.text: A leader is best when people barely know he exists, when his work is done, his aim fulfilled, they will say: we did it ourselves.
Evening Quotes.author: Laotzu

Evening Quotes.text: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
Evening Quotes.author: Steve Jobs

Evening Quotes.text: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
Evening Quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

Evening Quotes.text: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
Evening Quotes.author: Confucius

Evening Quotes.text: Life is a succession of lessons which must be lived to be understood.
Evening Quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Evening Quotes.text: What I cannot create, I do not understand.
Evening Quotes.author: Richard Feynman

Evening Quotes.text: Science is the belief in the ignorance of experts.
Evening Quotes.author: Richard Feynman

Evening Quotes.text: Well done is better than well said.
Evening Quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

Evening Quotes.text: By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail.
Evening Quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

Evening Quotes.text: Courage starts with showing up and letting ourselves be seen.
Evening Quotes.author: Brené Brown

Evening Quotes.text: People don't buy what you do; they buy why you do it.
Evening Quotes.author: Simon Sinek

Evening Quotes.text: Creativity is thinking up new things. Innovation is doing new things.
Evening Quotes.author: Theodore Levitt

Evening Quotes.text: The chief enemy of creativity is 'good' sense.
Evening Quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

Evening Quotes.text: To live a creative life, we must lose our fear of being wrong.
Evening Quotes.author: Joseph Chilton Pearce

Evening Quotes.text: Creativity involves breaking out of established patterns in order to look at things in a different way.
Evening Quotes.author: Edward de Bono

Evening Quotes.text: The creative adult is the child who survived.
Evening Quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

Evening Quotes.text: An essential aspect of creativity is not being afraid to fail.
Evening Quotes.author: Edwin Land

Evening Quotes.text: Creativity is contagious, pass it on.
Evening Quotes.author: Albert Einstein

Evening Quotes.text: You can't use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
Evening Quotes.author: Maya Angelou

Evening Quotes.text: Every child is an artist. The problem is how to remain an artist once we grow up.
Evening Quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

Evening Quotes.text: Creativity is intelligence having fun.
Evening Quotes.author: Albert Einstein

Evening Quotes.text: Reflection is one of the most underused yet powerful tools for success.
Evening Quotes.author: Richard Carlson

Evening Quotes.text: We do not learn from experience... we learn from reflecting on experience.
Evening Quotes.author: John Dewey

Evening Quotes.text: The only real mistake is the one from which we learn nothing.
Evening Quotes.author: Henry Ford

Evening Quotes.text: Without reflection, we go blindly on our way, creating more unintended consequences, and failing to achieve anything useful.
Evening Quotes.author: Margaret J. Wheatley

Evening Quotes.text: Reflect upon your present blessings, of which every man has plenty; not on your past misfortunes, of which all men have some.
Evening Quotes.author: Charles Dickens

Evening Quotes.text: Life can only be understood backwards; but it must be lived forwards.
Evening Quotes.author: Søren Kierkegaard

Evening Quotes.text: Reflection is the lamp of the heart. If it departs, the heart will have no light.
Evening Quotes.author: Abdullah ibn Alawi al-Haddad

Evening Quotes.text: By three methods we may learn wisdom: First, by reflection, which is noblest; second, by imitation, which is easiest; and third by experience, which is the bitterest.
Evening Quotes.author: Confucius

Evening Quotes.text: Mistakes are always forgivable, if one has the courage to admit them.
Evening Quotes.author: Bruce Lee

Evening Quotes.text: Pause and remember – Nothing lasts forever. Better days are coming, but they will come faster with faith.
Evening Quotes.author: Jennifer Young

Evening Quotes.text: Gratitude is not only the greatest of virtues, but the parent of all others.
Evening Quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

Evening Quotes.text: Gratitude is the fairest blossom which springs from the soul.
Evening Quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

Evening Quotes.text: Let us be grateful to the people who make us happy; they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom.
Evening Quotes.author: Marcel Proust

Evening Quotes.text: Gratitude is a powerful catalyst for happiness. It’s the spark that lights a fire of joy in your soul.
Evening Quotes.author: Amy Collette
